RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foal s Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I MATTER trailed for a half, began to close ground on the far turn, dropped inside entering the stretch, rallied determinedly under left handed urging and was along in time. UNDERCOVER LADY hopped at the start, set all the pace, widened into the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. CONDUTTORE chased the pace along the inside into the far turn, shifted out at the quarter pole, drifted to the eighth path entering the stretch and finished determinedly. MAY BEAU got out on the first turn, checked repeatedly into the far turn dropped back to trail before the quarter pole then came on again near the inside, drifted to the five path late and leveled off. PLAYFUL SUMMER improved position on the far turn then came up empty. WHAT KNOT chased the pace two and three wide then was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: May Beau
ENTRY.COMMENT: got out first turn, checked repeatedly 2nd turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Conduttore
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, angled out 1/4 pole, finished well, 8path

ENTRY.NAME: What Knot
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2-3wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Playful Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position 2nd turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: I Matter
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed half, improved 3 wide 2nd turn, dropped inside, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Undercover Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, set pace, drew off upper stretch, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 3. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KEYED ON TOP pressed the pace three then two wide into the stretch, responded readily when set down, made the lead before the furlong marker and finished full of run under a strong hand ride to win going away. THE DRAKE unhurried early, closed fast through the stretch in the seven path and got up for second. JOHNNY U away alertly, set the pace off the rail in the four path while inside rivals into the stretch then was. O CIGANO chased the early pace two wide in the five path, was in tight entering the turn and dropped back. GUCCISSIMO was no factor. COLONEL MIKE had good early speed outside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: O Cigano
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5path, in tight 3/8 pole, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: The Drake
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed fast late 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny U
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 4path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Guccissimo
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Keyed On Top
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, perfect trip, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Colonel Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 4 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 17900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VICTORY DIVISION trailed outside down the backstretch, angled inside before the turn, closed willingly, shifted outside the leader to the five path in upper stretch, rallied under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. TWINSPIREDJOEY made the lead soon after the start, set the pace off the rail in the four path, set all the pace then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. ACCURATE forwardly place, saved ground through the turn, shifted out to the six path entering the stretch then went evenly. THANKSDAD chased the pace from the five path and faded in the stretch. BIG STOCK WINNER close up early, stopped on the turn and was eased to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Twinspiredjoey
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace off rail, late stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Thanksdad
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5path, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Big Stock Winner
ENTRY.COMMENT: close early, stopped turn, eased to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Accurate
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, saved ground turn, drifted 6path, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Victory Division
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,dropped inside turn,closed willingly,up in final strides

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEXY ANNA pressed the pace two wide into the turn, made the lead near the quarter pole and drew off under left handed urging. DOUBLE EDGED stalked the pace three wide and finished clear for second in the five path. J J'S FANCY with the second flight between horses, swung wide, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack before the furlong marker then finished evenly. CATABOUT failed to menace. MOBIL MEISTER bumped at the start and was no threat. CITY SIGNS bumped at the start and was outrun. NOT A WILD BRAT with the second flight inside, was through after a half. REBEL POWER away alertly, set the pace to the quarter pole then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight between horses, swung wide, drifted mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Rebel Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace 1/4 pole, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Wild Brat
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Catabout
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Meister
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: City Signs
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Lexy Anna
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, rallied 2 wide turn, clear quickly, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Double Edged
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, second best, 5path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 3. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCK ON KITTEN pressed the early pace along the inside, stopped back on the turn, angled out to the six path, came on again under left handed urging and was along in time CALL WEST trailed through the turn, closed determinedly in the six path through deep stretch and got up for second. LEOMBRUNO broke in full stride to set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. KING ANDRES with the second flight two wide, swung wide giving up ground entering the stretch then came on again late in the eight path. GOLDEN READY failed to menace. GALTERO was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Call West
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally, 6path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Galtero
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: King Andres
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, swung wide, lost ground, came again 8path

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, dropped back turn, came again 6path, in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Leombruno
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, shook clear turn, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE MAY 3, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Ra ce Since March 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXACTITUDE pressed the pace three wide through the turn, made the lead nearing the top of the stretch, quickly opened a daylight advantage when put to a right handed whip and won under confident handling. SO GO MY LUCEILLE close up along the inside, angled out past the quarter pole, rallied determinedly three wide and got up for second. PROPHETESS never far back, found her best stride late four wide. WHERETHERE'SSMOKE away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide into the turn then was outfinished. KIST was no factor. SCARLETT'S AWISH pressed the early pace along the inside and faded in the stretch. PROPER ETIQUETTE failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: So Go My Luceille
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, angled out 1/4p, ate rally, 3 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Prophetess
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, best stride late, 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Kist
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlett's Awish
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Proper Etiquette
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Exactitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, full of run, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Wherethere'ssmoke
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, 2 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 3 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMIGO'S AFFAIR broke in full stride to set all the pace and maintained his advantage under mild urging. FIRST HOMESTEAD chased the inner and finished second best in the six path. LAST DROP OF WINE pressured the winner early along the inside and faded in the stretch. EXONERATED PREZ close up along the inside early, failed to respond. LUCKY ANDY failed to menace. NICHOLAS JAMES trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Exonerated Prez
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Last Drop of Wine
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Nicholas James
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Andy
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: First Homestead
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, second best, 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Amigo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, held well, mild urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDYMONIUM set the pace along the inside through the clubhouse turn, gave up the advantage, surged two wide on the far turn to make the lead before the quarter pole then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while taken in hand late. ICY RAIN trailed for four and one half furlongs, rallied steadily in the four path and finished second best. SOLDAT TEMPTATION vied the lead three wide around the first turn, made the lead at the five eighths pole, set the pace into the far turn then weakened late. LORDHEARMYPRAYER pressed the pace two wide into the far turn then faded. FREEDOM'S ALLURE miss stepped at the start and failed to menace. DANCING FOR MONEY was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Candymonium
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, dropped back, came again, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing for Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Lordhearmyprayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom's Allure
ENTRY.COMMENT: miss stepped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally, 4path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Soldat Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, took charge 5/8pole, set pace 2nd turn, weakened
